Who are we
This application serves the staff of King Abdul Aziz University to help them find the nearst shelters site and assembly points in the case of disasters and emergencies and facilitate the communicate with the center within the University.
About EDC Vision Excellence in Emergency and Disaster Management. Mission Continually enhance the university readiness to reduce the impact of emergencies and disasters and to improve KAU resilience through modern technologies, integrating activities and provision of information. Objectives 1- A comprehensive center at KAU equipped with appropriate technologies and resources to deal with all stages of emergencies and disasters (before, during and after).
2- To reduce the losses of lives and properties associated with emergencies and disasters.
3- To improve KAU readiness to control potential hazards and to enhance the recovery activities.
4- To streamline KAU activities through a comprehensive and scientific approach to ease and synchronize emergency and disaster field operations.
